tutorial.text: Welcome to the shop! This is where you'll run your business.
Use WASD to move around and explore.
Head to the back room to check out your crafting area! I'll meet you there!
Great! Now let's craft your first potion.
Press E on the crate to grab an empty bottle.
With the bottle selected, grab ingredients from the mix barrel.
Mix your unmixed potion in the cauldron by pressing E.
Now wait for the potion to finish brewing...
The potion is ready! Press E to grab it from the cauldron.
Great! Now head back to the front room to stock your shelf. See you there!
Press E on a shelf to open it.
Now Shift+Click or Click+Drag your potion to stock it on the shelf!
Great! Now press ESC to close the shelf menu.
Perfect! You're ready to run your shop!
If you need to save, your bed in back is always there for you!
If you need to refill bottles, ingredients, or supplies, head to the town!
One more thing... when you see the $ icon above the register, don't wait to check them out! Or else...

shopkeeper_greeting.speaker: Shopkeeper
shopkeeper_greeting.text: Back again? What can I get you?
